game

Class CreateLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.CreateLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LevelFactory

    public class CreateLevel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LevelFactory
    This is where the level is created. The walls, hole, and robots are defined in this. This class specifies a hardcoded level.
    Since:
    2015-04-24
    Version:
    2015-04-28
    Author:
    Spencer Davis, Josh Kepros, Josh McDermott, Chris Swanson
